root.name: Neo Scavenger
root.description: OverviewYou are one of the few survivors in the near-future after a long war in which supernatural activity heavily influenced the outcome. Mankind is scattered around the world and you awake in this world without knowing who you are. You are also alone and awake in an abandoned hospital with few clues to why you are here.NEO Scavenger is a game where you have to survive this world long enough to discover who you are. Each turn you have to make a decision what you are going to do with your precious time and supplies. The game goes as far as that you have to keep warm, eat and drink enough and kill enough to survive.LinksOfficial siteDesura
